name: red-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Coolness during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Coolness while in a contest.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that raises COOL in CONTESTS.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises COOL in CONTESTS.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. It boosts the holding POKéMON’s COOL condition in CONTESTS.
